name: Morph Blaster
description:
A first person megaman inspired game!

The game was an exercise in learning some more tricks inside Unreal Engine 4

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Shoot (Hold to charge with the starting weapon)

Right Click - Dash

Left Shift - Switch Weapons (if the weapon isn't switching fire one shot with the primary weapon and then press shift, if it still doesn't you haven't picked up a secondary weapon)

Things I know the game needs:

Sound effects!

Background music!

The stage boss!

More enemy types!

Crosshairs!
